portfoliia.title: Portfoliia - Saas
portfoliia.description: I created Portfoliia to make building professional portfolios and resumes simple and fast. This CMS-powered platform has empowered several users to create stunning portfolios and includes insightful analytics to track their performance. Portfoliia also earned the #1 Product of the Day badge on Faizer.
slideShowImages: /assets/images/portfoliia/Screenshot 2025-09-16 at 02-39-50 Divine-Vessel O - Lead Full Stack Software Developer @ Skiyen Portfolio Portfoliia.png
/assets/images/portfoliia/Screenshot 2025-09-16 at 02-40-04 Divine-Vessel O - Lead Full Stack Software Developer @ Skiyen Resume Portfoliia.png

fluxnet.title: Fluxinet – Saas
fluxnet.description: I built Fluxinet to solve a real problem I noticed among small business owners around me. Managing inventory was chaotic, often done with pen and paper or clunky spreadsheets. I wanted to make something simple, clean, and efficient. Since launching, over 700 Nigerian businesses have started using it to stay on top of their stock levels and streamline their operations. It's still growing, and I’m constantly improving it based on real feedback from everyday users.

marokug.title: Marokug
marokug.description: At Marokug, I collaborated with a team of frontend and backend developers to create an online learning platform. Marokug empowers students to explore and learn a wide range of courses at their own pace, test their understanding through interactive quizzes and exams, and deepen their knowledge with additional learning materials.

mtalers.title: Mtalers
mtalers.description: Mtalers is an educational blog developed for a client, focusing on providing a comprehensive learning experience. It incorporates various technologies such as jQuery, Php and MySql to deliver interactive and engaging educational content. The platform aims to enhance the learning process through its user-friendly interface and extensive functionality.

geegpayFrontendChallenge.title: Geegpay Frontend Challenge
geegpayFrontendChallenge.description: I converted a Figma design to HTML in the Geepay Frontend Challenge. Analyzed design, hand-coded clean & semantic HTML, ensured responsiveness & accessibility, tested & refined for a pixel-perfect outcome.

strender.title: Strender
strender.description: I originally built Strender as a sports hub, but it’s grown into a full-on news platform. Now it supports all kinds of news — sports, politics, tech, whatever matters. It pulls in real-time updates, live scores, and highlights, and I kept the anonymous commenting so users can speak freely without filters. It’s my personal take on what a modern news platform should feel like.
